blocks.name: cmnc
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of monic polynomials.

blocks.name: cplylt
blocks.content: Extend class notatin with the class of limited-degree polynomials.

blocks.name: df-mnc
blocks.content: Define the class of monic polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: df-plylt
blocks.content: Define the class of limited-degree polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: dgrsub2
blocks.content: Subtracting two polynomials with the same degree and top coefficient gives a polynomial of strictly lower degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dgrsub2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdgr, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wi(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4)), wcel(c4, cn))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c4, cn), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0p), clt, c4))
  syl5eqbr(cfv(cdgr, c0p), clt, c4, nat0, wcel(c4, cn))
  dgr0()
  nngt0(c4)
  breq1d(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4, cfv(cdgr, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p))
  fveq2(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p, cdgr)
  ord(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wo(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, c4), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), c4), nat0))
  breqtrd(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, c4, cif(cfv(cdgr, c2), cfv(cdgr, c0), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, cif(cfv(cdgr, c2), cfv(cdgr, c0), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, cif(cfv(cdgr, c2), cfv(cdgr, c0), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)))
  dgrsub(c0, cc, c2, cfv(cdgr, c0), cfv(cdgr, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, c2))
  syl6eq(cif(cfv(cdgr, c2), cfv(cdgr, c0), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2))), c4, cif(c4, c4, wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  ifeq12d(cfv(cdgr, c2), cfv(cdgr, c0), c4, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)))
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c0), c4))
  eqcomi(cfv(cdgr, c0), c4)
  ifid(c4, wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), c4), nat0, cfv(co(cfv(ccoe, c0), cof(cmin), cfv(ccoe, c2)), c4), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4), cmin, cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), c4, co(cfv(ccoe, c0), cof(cmin), cfv(ccoe, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4))), wceq(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), co(cfv(ccoe, c0), cof(cmin), cfv(ccoe, c2))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3)), wceq(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), co(cfv(ccoe, c0), cof(cmin), cfv(ccoe, c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)))
  coesub(c0, cc, c2, cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(ccoe, c2))
  mpdan(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wceq(cfv(co(cfv(ccoe, c0), cof(cmin), cfv(ccoe, c2)), c4), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4), cmin, cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4))), wcel(c4, cn0))
  ofval(c4, cn0, cfv(ccoe, c0), cmin, cfv(ccoe, c2), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4), cn0, cn0, universe, universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  ffnd(cfv(ccoe, c0), cn0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3)), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4))), wf(cfv(ccoe, c0), cn0, cc))
  coef3(c0, c1, cfv(ccoe, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ccoe, c0))
  ffnd(cfv(ccoe, c2), cn0, cc, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wcel(cn0, universe))
  nn0ex()
  inidm(cn0)
  simplr3(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)), wcel(c4, cn0))
  eqidd(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wcel(c4, cn0)))
  subidd(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  ffvelrnd(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4, cc, cn0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3)), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4))), wf(cfv(ccoe, c2), cn0, cc))
  coef3(c2, c3, cfv(ccoe, c2))
  eqid(cfv(ccoe, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4)))), wb(wo(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), clt, c4)), wa(wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), cle, c4), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, co(c0, cof(cmin), c2)), c4), nat0))), wcel(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c4, cn0))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c3))), w3a(wceq(cfv(cdgr, c2), c4), wcel(c4, cn), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), c4), cfv(cfv(ccoe, c2), c4))), wcel(co(c0, cof(cmin), c2), cfv(cply, cc)))

blocks.pretty:
thm dgrsub2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)))→(deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4)
  ⊣ c4 =(deg ` c0)
} = {
  pm2.61d(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4, (c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p)
  syl(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), ((c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p →(deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4), c4 ∈ ℕ)
  syl5ibrcom(c4 ∈ ℕ, (c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p, (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4, (deg ` 0p)[<]c4)
  syl5eqbr((deg ` 0p), clt, c4, nat0, c4 ∈ ℕ)
  dgr0()
  nngt0(c4)
  breq1d((deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2)), clt, c4, (deg ` 0p), (c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p)
  fveq2((c0[oF(-)]c2), c0p, cdgr)
  ord(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), (c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p, (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4)
  mpbir2and(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), ((c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p ∨(deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4), (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[≤]c4, ((coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2))` c4)= 0)
  breqtrd((deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2)), cle, c4, if((deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2),(deg ` c2),(deg ` c0)), ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  adantr((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3)), ((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)), (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[≤]if((deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2),(deg ` c2),(deg ` c0)))
  syl2an(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c3), (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[≤]if((deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2),(deg ` c2),(deg ` c0)), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  dgrsub(c0, cc, c2, (deg ` c0), (deg ` c2))
  eqid((deg ` c0))
  eqid((deg ` c2))
  syl6eq(if((deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2),(deg ` c2),(deg ` c0)), c4, if((deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2), c4, c4), ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  ifeq12d((deg ` c2), (deg ` c0), c4, c4, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), (deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2))
  simpr1((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3)), (deg ` c2)= c4, c4 ∈ ℕ, ((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))
  a1i(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), (deg ` c0)= c4)
  eqcomi((deg ` c0), c4)
  ifid(c4, (deg ` c0)[≤](deg ` c2))
  3eqtrd(((coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2))` c4), nat0, (((coeff ` c0)[oF(-)](coeff ` c2))` c4), (((coeff ` c2)` c4)[-]((coeff ` c2)` c4)), ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  fveq1d((coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2)), c4, ((coeff ` c0)[oF(-)](coeff ` c2)), ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  adantr((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3)), ((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)), (coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2))=((coeff ` c0)[oF(-)](coeff ` c2)))
  syl2an(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c3), (coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2))=((coeff ` c0)[oF(-)](coeff ` c2)), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  coesub(c0, cc, c2, (coeff ` c0), (coeff ` c2))
  mpdan(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), (((coeff ` c0)[oF(-)](coeff ` c2))` c4)=(((coeff ` c2)` c4)[-]((coeff ` c2)` c4)), c4 ∈ ℕ0)
  ofval(c4, cn0, (coeff ` c0), cmin, (coeff ` c2), ((coeff ` c2)` c4), ((coeff ` c2)` c4), cn0, cn0, universe, universe, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  ffnd((coeff ` c0), cn0, cc, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c3), ((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)), ((coeff ` c0): ℕ0 → ℂ))
  coef3(c0, c1, (coeff ` c0))
  eqid((coeff ` c0))
  ffnd((coeff ` c2), cn0, cc, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  a1i(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), ℕ0 ∈ 𝕌)
  nn0ex()
  inidm(cn0)
  simplr3((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3)), (deg ` c2)= c4, c4 ∈ ℕ, ((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4), c4 ∈ ℕ0)
  eqidd(((coeff ` c2)` c4), (((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)))∧ c4 ∈ ℕ0))
  subidd(((coeff ` c2)` c4), ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  ffvelrnd((coeff ` c2), c4, cc, cn0, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c3), ((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)), ((coeff ` c2): ℕ0 → ℂ))
  coef3(c2, c3, (coeff ` c2))
  eqid((coeff ` c2))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))), (((c0[oF(-)]c2)= 0p ∨(deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[<]c4)↔((deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2))[≤]c4 ∧((coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2))` c4)= 0)), (c0[oF(-)]c2)∈(Poly ` ℂ), c4 ∈ ℕ0)
  adantr((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3)), ((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4)), (c0[oF(-)]c2)∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  syl2an(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c3), (c0[oF(-)]c2)∈(Poly ` ℂ), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  sseli(c0, (Poly ` c1), (Poly ` ℂ))
  plyssc(c1)
  sseli(c2, (Poly ` c3), (Poly ` ℂ))
  plyssc(c3)
  plysubcl(c0, cc, c2)
  nnnn0d(c4, ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3))∧((deg ` c2)= c4 ∧ c4 ∈ ℕ ∧((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))))
  simpr2((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c3)), (deg ` c2)= c4, c4 ∈ ℕ, ((coeff ` c0)` c4)=((coeff ` c2)` c4))
  dgrlt((c0[oF(-)]c2), cc, c4, (deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2)), (coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2)))
  eqid((deg `(c0[oF(-)]c2)))
  eqid((coeff `(c0[oF(-)]c2)))
}

blocks.name: elmnc
blocks.content: Property of a monic polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmnc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1)))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1)), wss(c1, cc))
  elpwid(c1, cc, wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)))
  sseldi(c1, cpw(cc), cdm(cmnc), wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)))
  dmmptss(hs0, cmnc, cpw(cc), crab(hs1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1)))
  elfvdm(c0, cmnc, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1), wss(c1, cc))
  plybss(c0, c1)
  syl6bb(wss(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1)), wcel(c0, crab(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1), crab(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1)), wss(c1, cc))
  sylbir(wss(c1, cc), wceq(cfv(cmnc, c1), crab(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1))), wcel(c1, cpw(cc)))
  elpw2(c1, cc)
  cnex()
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cpw(cc), cmnc, crab(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1)), crab(hs1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1)))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(crab(hs1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1)), crab(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1))), wceq(cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), cfv(cply, c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cply)
  rabeq(hs1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1))
  df-mnc(hs0, hs1)
  rabex(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1))
  fvex(cply, c1)
  elrab(hs1, c0, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1, cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq12d(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)), cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c0, ccoe)
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c0, cdgr)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cc))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(hs1, cfv(cply, c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), nat1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cply, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cply, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elmnc(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Monic ` c1)↔(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ∈(Monic ` c1), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1), c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  elpwid(c1, cc, c0 ∈(Monic ` c1))
  sseldi(c1, P(ℂ), dom(Monic), c0 ∈(Monic ` c1))
  dmmptss(hs0, cmnc, P(ℂ), { hs1 ∈(Poly ` hs0)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 })
  elfvdm(c0, cmnc, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), ((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1, c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  plybss(c0, c1)
  syl6bb(c1 ⊆ ℂ, c0 ∈(Monic ` c1), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1), c0 ∈ { hs1 ∈(Poly ` c1)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 })
  eleq2d(c0, (Monic ` c1), { hs1 ∈(Poly ` c1)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 }, c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  sylbir(c1 ⊆ ℂ, (Monic ` c1)= { hs1 ∈(Poly ` c1)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 }, c1 ∈ P(ℂ))
  elpw2(c1, cc)
  cnex()
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, P(ℂ), cmnc, { hs1 ∈(Poly ` c1)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 }, { hs1 ∈(Poly ` hs0)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 })
  syl(hs0 = c1, { hs1 ∈(Poly ` hs0)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 } = { hs1 ∈(Poly ` c1)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 }, (Poly ` hs0)=(Poly ` c1))
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cply)
  rabeq(hs1, (Poly ` hs0), (Poly ` c1), ((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1)
  df-mnc(hs0, hs1)
  rabex(hs1, (Poly ` c1), ((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1)
  fvex(cply, c1)
  elrab(hs1, c0, (Poly ` c1), ((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1, ((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1)
  eqeq1d(((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1)), nat1, ((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0)), hs1 = c0)
  fveq12d((coeff ` hs1), (deg ` hs1), (coeff ` c0), (deg ` c0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, ccoe)
  fveq2(hs1, c0, cdgr)
  diff.hs0.c(P(ℂ))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 ∈(Poly ` c1)|((coeff ` hs1)`(deg ` hs1))= 1 })
  diff.hs1.c((Poly ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.c((Poly ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1)
}

blocks.name: mncply
blocks.content: A monic polynomial is a polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: mnccoe
blocks.content: A monic polynomial has leading coefficient 1. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: mncn0
blocks.content: A monic polynomial is not zero. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mncn0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wne(c0, c0p))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cmnc, c1)), wne(c0, c0p), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1))
  mnccoe(c0, c1)
  necon2i(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1, c0, c0p)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, c0p), wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1), wne(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0p), cfv(cdgr, c0p)), nat1))
  eqnetri(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0p), cfv(cdgr, c0p)), nat1, nat0)
  eqtri(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0p), cfv(cdgr, c0p)), nat0, cfv(cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)), cfv(cdgr, c0p)))
  fveq1i(cfv(ccoe, c0p), cfv(cdgr, c0p), cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)))
  coe0()
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cxp(cn0, csn(nat0)), cfv(cdgr, c0p)), nat0), wcel(cfv(cdgr, c0p), cn0))
  eqeltri(cfv(cdgr, c0p), cn0, nat0)
  dgr0()
  0nn0()
  fvconst2(cfv(cdgr, c0p), cn0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  0ne1()
  neeq1d(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0)), nat1, cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0p), cfv(cdgr, c0p)), wceq(c0, c0p))
  fveq12d(cfv(ccoe, c0), cfv(cdgr, c0), cfv(ccoe, c0p), cfv(cdgr, c0p), wceq(c0, c0p))
  fveq2(c0, c0p, ccoe)
  fveq2(c0, c0p, cdgr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mncn0(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Monic ` c1)→ c0 ≠ 0p)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈(Monic ` c1), c0 ≠ 0p, ((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))= 1)
  mnccoe(c0, c1)
  necon2i(((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0)), nat1, c0, c0p)
  mpbiri(c0 = 0p, ((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0))≠ 1, ((coeff ` 0p)`(deg ` 0p))≠ 1)
  eqnetri(((coeff ` 0p)`(deg ` 0p)), nat1, nat0)
  eqtri(((coeff ` 0p)`(deg ` 0p)), nat0, ((ℕ0 × { 0 })`(deg ` 0p)))
  fveq1i((coeff ` 0p), (deg ` 0p), (ℕ0 × { 0 }))
  coe0()
  ax-mp(((ℕ0 × { 0 })`(deg ` 0p))= 0, (deg ` 0p)∈ ℕ0)
  eqeltri((deg ` 0p), cn0, nat0)
  dgr0()
  0nn0()
  fvconst2((deg ` 0p), cn0, nat0)
  c0ex()
  0ne1()
  neeq1d(((coeff ` c0)`(deg ` c0)), nat1, ((coeff ` 0p)`(deg ` 0p)), c0 = 0p)
  fveq12d((coeff ` c0), (deg ` c0), (coeff ` 0p), (deg ` 0p), c0 = 0p)
  fveq2(c0, c0p, ccoe)
  fveq2(c0, c0p, cdgr)
}
